==== T-shirts (Jan 2011) ====

** design : <nowiki>[[File:t-shirt_Ubuntu-be_01-2011.jpg]]</nowiki>

** t-shirts will be available in most of the booths/events organized by Ubuntu.be.
** stocks are located in Ghent and Hasselt
** shipment price: 3,5 euros OR pick up at Ghent or Hasselt
